preqs: Must be enrolled in: F3701 Bachelor of Fine Art (Honours)

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {F3701%}

unitName: Project studies. Art history and theory honours
description: This unit is the first part of a major art history and theory research project. It provides an opportunity to research issues and begin the work required for a 15000 word written thesis. The thesis should be on a topic chosen by the student and approved by the department at the time of application.. The thesis will be written under supervision, and students will be expected to meet regularly with their supervisors. This unit is followed by AHT4112 Major project (Art history and theory honours), under which the project and research must be completed.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
